about_the_game:
Jump, dodge and flap yourself out of danger. See what distance your penguin can reach while dodging various objects as well as sharks, birds and UFOs!

The aim of the game is to see what distance you can reach in metres. This requires jumping platforms and dodging obstacles and enemies such as trees, snowmen, birds, sharks etc. Collecting fish allows you to flap while airborne to facilitate dodging.

Hitting an obstacle or enemy, falling into the shark infested water or getting abducted by an UFO means game over.

The game is a randomly procedurally generated infinite runner so never repeats platform, obstacle/enemy positions or movement.

More features coming soon.

Hitting an obstacle or enemy, falling into the shark infested water or getting abducted by an UFO means game over.

The game is a randomly procedurally generated infinite runner so never repeats platform, obstacle/enemy positions or movement.

name: HFH

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 1030 Ti or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • VR Support: N/A
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • VR Support: N/A
